text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Okay, our next training session is at 3<n>p.m. See you in six
and a half hours.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
After an early morning training<n>session, I walk with Eishin
Flash to<n>class.

text_block_list.name: Umamusume A
text_block_list.text:
Did you hear? Best Crepe is gonna<n>be at the gates after
school!

text_block_list.name: Umamusume B
text_block_list.text: For real? That's super rare! We have<n>to go!

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Best Crepe...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
It's a food truck for crepes—they<n>don't have an actual
store. Their<n>crepes have been all the talk amongst<n>the
students for about half a year<n>now.

"Take a bite, hear destiny calling."<n>They say words can't
truly capture<n>the taste.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
The owner does things on a whim,<n>meaning the shop can
pop up at any<n>time without warning. It's known as<n>the
"phantom crepe shop."

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: If those two are correct, it's coming<n>here after school.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Well, mention of this crepe truck<n>certainly got her in a
talkative mood.
choice_data_list: Why don't you go check it out?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Not possible. We have training from 3<n>to 8 p.m., and there's
no record of it<n>ever staying that late.
choice_data_list: Then why don't we move our start time a bit?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...No, we don't need to change<n>anything. We've set our
schedule, so<n>we should stick to it.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
That's the proper way of doing<n>things. Now then, I have
class in<n>fourteen minutes, so I should get<n>going.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She's still adamant as ever about<n>sticking to her schedules,
but she<n>doesn't seem all too happy about<n>missing out...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Pant, pant... Phew...
choice_data_list: All right, that's it for today.
All right, that's it for today.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: Yes, thank you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Once our after-school sessions are<n>over, we normally chat
about her<n>progress, but...

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I'll be heading out early today.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She runs right off... Her eagerness<n>reminds me of our
exchange this<n>morning.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: ...Trainer.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
My guess turns out to be right—I find<n>her in front of the
school gates, but<n>there's no one else around.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Going by hashtagged posts on social<n>media, it left
somewhere between an<n>hour and an hour and forty-six<n>
minutes ago.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...Best Crepe has come to the school<n>three times now, and
all three times, it<n>hasn't fit into my schedule.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This means more to her than I<n>thought. But given how
unpredictable<n>the food truck is, there's really only<n>one
thing she can do.
choice_data_list:
Next time, why don't you try adjusting your
schedule on the spot?

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I know you're trying to be helpful, but<n>I can't do that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text: I am curious about it, but I can'tlet a simple curiosity throw off myperfect schedule.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Following it to the letter is what<n>makes me stronger. So no, I
can't<n>adjust it.
choice_data_list: As long as you're okay with that.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
...Next time, I'll try to find out when<n>it'll be here before I
make my<n>schedule.

text_block_list.name: Eishin Flash
text_block_list.text:
Well, I'm going back to my dorm. See<n>you tomorrow at 6
a.m.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
That's one of her best<n>strengths—sticking to her beliefs no<n>
matter what comes her way. Even<n>so... I feel she could
learn to treat<n>herself now and then.
